name: Love Number (Numerology)

claims.object: A single digit number calculated from a birth date used to learn about relationships.

surface_layer.definition: A single digit number calculated from a birth date used to learn about relationships.

deep_layer.mechanism: Calculated by adding the digits of a birthdate and reducing the sum to a single digit.

instance_layer: A person born on January 1, 1975 has a love number of 6 (1+1+1+9+7+5=24, 2+4=6).
